basic.description: In-depth analysis of experimental approaches for the study of insect viruses in cell culture and practical hands-on laboratory experience through a research project.
basic.subject: MICR
basic.title: Practicum in Virology

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITES    MICR 221 & BIOL 205 & (MBIO 218 or 318) & (Lvl 4 & reg in the LISC Major or Spec. Plan) & (GPA of 2.5).
EXCLUSION    No more than 9.0 units from ANAT499; CANC499; EPID499; LISC499; MICR455; MICR499; NSCI499; PATH499; PHAR499; PHGY499
